price: 85. Y cuando los injustos que niegan la verdad vean el castigo, este no se les mitigará ni se les aplazará.
arabic: وَإِذَا رَءَا ٱلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُواْ ٱلۡعَذَابَ فَلَا يُخَفَّفُ عَنۡهُمۡ وَلَا هُمۡ يُنظَرُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: wa-idhā raā alladhīna ẓalamū al-ʿadhāba falā yukhaffafu ʿanhum walā hum yunẓarūna
